1) 3 years after the battle. Mugen has an audience with the Shogun.
2) They discuss Kage-sama, a dangerous criminal that plots against the Shogun.
3) Mugen gets the mission from the Shogun to hunt Kage-sama.
4) The Shogun's brother (=Kage-sama), son and nephew are also  setup here.
5) Mugen recruits his old comrade Hayato.
6) Hayato's first assignment is a convoy raid. The convoy is tied to Kage-sama.

column12: Simplified Chinese

column10: After the fall of Osaka Castle, Japan was united under the rule of the new Shogun.
column12: 大阪城攻破后，新将军统一了日本。

column10: In the following years, the Shogun's new laws stabilize the nation. Culture and the economy flourish as the land and its people recover from years of conflict.
column12: 在随后的几年中，将军颁布的新法为国家带了稳定，随着人民从多年战乱中逐渐恢复，文化与经济也得到了蓬勃发展。

column10: But now this fragile peace is threatened. Rumour spreads of a conspiracy to overthrow  the Shogun.
column12: 然而，短暂的和平再次受到威胁。谣言四起，传闻有人密谋推翻将军。

column10: No one knowns the identity of the leader. But a name is whispered in the streets: "Kage-sama".
column12: 谋反者的身份无人知晓。但在坊间流传着一个名字：“影大人”。

column10: Edo Castle: Mugen trains with Ryūnosuke, the Shogun's son, and Masaru, the Shogun's nephew. They are interrupted when Mugen is summoned to the Shogun.
column12: Edo Castle: Mugen trains with Ryūnosuke, the Shogun's son, and Masaru, the Shogun's nephew. They are interrupted when Mugen is summoned to the Shogun.

column10: Edo Castle, 3 years after the battle of Osaka Castle.
column12: 江户城，大阪攻城战三年后。

column10: Your last attack showed spirit, but you both neglected your defence. A samurai must have patience, for its lack will cost him dearly.
column12: 你们刚才的进攻充满了斗志，但却都忽视了防守。真正的武士必须学会耐心，否则会付出惨痛代价。

column10: I understand, Mugen-sensei.
column12: 我明白了，无限老师。

column10: Even together we are no match for you. Does our sensei enjoy beating us!
column12: 即使我们联手也不是你的对手。老师你是不是很喜欢这样虐我们啊！

column10: This is pointless! Even together we could not win! Does our sensei enjoy beating us?
column12: 说这些有什么用！即使我们联手也赢不了，老师你是不是很喜欢这样虐我们啊？

column10: I enjoy your progress, Masaru-sama. You and Ryūnosuke-sama are your fathers' children. Their talent lies within you.
column12: 我只会因为看到你们的进步而高兴，真申大人。你和龙之介大人都是将门之后，我相信虎父无犬子。

column10: And yet, you defeated us both with single strike.
column12: 然而，你一击就打败我俩了。

column10: Patience. I know the day will come when the two of you will force me to my knees.
column12: 要有耐心。我知道终有一天，你们两个会超越我的。

column10: I look forward to that day …
column12: 我期待那天的到来……

column10: Apologies, my lords. The Shogun has requested Mugen-sama's presence.
column12: 恕小的无礼。将军大人令我来传唤无限大人。

column9: to servant, then to Ryūnosuke, bowing
column10: I will come at once. Forgive me, my lords.
column12: 我马上就去。容我先行告退。

column10: Of course. Please, give my regards to my father.
column12: 好的。请代我向我父亲问安。

column10: Audience chamber: We briefly see Noboru, the Shogun's brother, then the Shogun gives Mugen the task to hunt Kage-sama. No one knows that Noboru is Kage-sama.
column12: Audience chamber: We briefly see Noboru, the Shogun's brother, then the Shogun gives Mugen the task to hunt Kage-sama. No one knows that Noboru is Kage-sama.

column12: EN2

column10: Audience Chamber.
column12: 谒见厅

column10: Brother. If you give me command of the Shogunate troops I will hunt down Kage-sama wherever a person speaks his name.
column12: 哥哥，如果你把幕府军指挥权交给我，我保证以后大街上不会再有人敢提影大人这三个字。

column10: I will, if the need arises for such drastic measures. For now, you will bow to the wisdom of your Shogun. Let us speak again tomorrow.
column12: 假如真到需要采取这种极端措施的地步，我会的。但现在你要相信哥哥作为将军的智慧。我们明天再谈吧。

column10: Of course brother. I will await your messenger.
column12: 好的，哥哥。我等你传唤。

column9: meets Mugen on the way out
column10: Mugen-san.
column12: 无限先生。

column10: Lord Noboru.
column12: 昇大人！

column10: You wished to see me, my Shogun.
column12: 有何吩咐，将军大人。

column10: Mugen. I received a message from our spies telling me of an illegal transport. There are wagons loaded with firearms bound for Kyoto.
column12: 无限，密探传回消息说有人非法运输。一队装有火器的车队正前往京都。

column10: Is it Kage-sama? Has he exposed himself?
column12: 是影大人吗？他是否已现身？

column10: It appears so. I want you to seize this transport. Find out where it came from, and you will no doubt find our enemy.
column12: 有这个可能。我想让你去截获车队，查出它的源头，也就必然能查出我们的敌人。

column10: I live to serve you, my Shogun.
column12: 在下愿赴汤蹈火，将军大人。

column10: This matter requires delicate hands. You will act with my authority. If you need assistance, choose with care.
column12: 此事需谨慎处理，我全权交给你办。假如需要人手，一定要仔细甄选。

column10: I already have someone in mind.
column12: 我已经有最佳人选了。

column10: Excellent, go then, Mugen. Bring me Kage-sama.
column12: 很好。去吧，无限。把影大人给我抓回来。

column10: I will not disappoint you, my Shogun.
column12: 我一定完成任务，将军大人。

column10: Tavern: Mugen hires Hayato
column12: Tavern: Mugen hires Hayato

column10: A few days later.
column12: 几天后

column9: enters the tavern, sits next to Hayato-san
column10: You are not an easy man to find, Hayato-san.
column12: 要找你可真不容易，隼人兄。

column10: It's part of the job. Still, I got your message. Need my help again?
column12: 干我们这行就得这样。我收到你的信了，又需要我帮忙了？

column10: I have been given a difficult task, one I wouldn't mind sharing with people I can trust.
column12: 我这有项棘手的任务，只能和最信任的人讲。

column10: Your letter … it mentioned Kage-sama. Thought that was just a rumour.
column12: 你信中……提到了影大人。我还以为他只是传闻而已。

column10: He is real, I assure you. So real so that the Shogun sees him as a threat to the peace. It will be him that we will hunt.
column12: 他确实存在，我向你保证。将军觉得他甚至足以威胁现在大好的和平局面。这次要抓的人就是他。

column10: Hmm ... as long as I get paid, I'm fine chasing ghosts. What's the mission?
column12: 嗯……让我去抓这种鬼也可以，只要付钱就行。任务具体是什么？

column10: At dawn tomorrow, an illegal transport will travel along the Nakasendō route.  It will pass through the area detailed in this letter.
column12: 明日拂晓，有个非法运输车队会沿中山道通过某个区域，具体细节在信里。

column9: Hayato takes and reads the document
column10: I want you to halt this convoy and eliminate the officers of the guard. At your signal, I will move in with Shogunate men.
column12: 我要你截停车队并干掉守卫军官，然后发出信号。随后我会带领幕府军拿下车队。

column10: Simple enough.
column12: 小菜一碟。

column9: stands up, finishes his drink, pockets the letter
column10: Alright, see you on the road.
column12: 那好，路上见。

column10: One more thing, Hayato-san.
column12: 还有件事，隼人兄。

column10: Hm?
column12: 嗯？

column10: Good to see you again.
column12: 很高兴再次见到你。

column10: Heh … likewise.
column12: 哈……我也是。
